data.title: Holiday Parties - Camp Courageous
data.text: Cour ier Camp Courageous Camp Courageous is a year-round recreational and respite care facility for individuals of all ages with disabilities. Holiday Parties Camp Courageous’ lodge was decorated for the season during the 2009 Annual Holiday Parties on December 16th and 17th. Hundreds of area school students, staff, and group home residents came for the free youth and adult parties. During the youth parties attendees enjoyed swimming, the wall climb, arts and crafts, games, and other activities. Everyone enjoyed holiday treats, met with Santa, and received a holiday gift. Thank you to everyone who attended this year’s events. A special thank you to “Dixie Notes Plus” for their wonderful performance during the adult party and to all the donors of the gifts that were handed out. The camp also appreciates all the volunteers who helped wrap the gifts. “…because we’re more alike than we are different.” Camp Courageous is a not-for-profit 501(c)(3) organization run on donations serving individuals of all ages with disabilities. For more information on how you can contribute, volunteer, or for other ways to help, see pages 30 and 31. 5,198 January 2010 • Volume 36, Issue 1 PO Box 418 • 12007 190th Street Monticello, IA 52310-0418 Ph. 319-465-5916 • FAX 319-465-5919 Email: info@campcourageous.org www.campcourageous.org Included in this issue: PMCI Convention ...............................
